talent_profile.college_dominance: Heisman Trophy winner - two-way player excellence
talent_profile.athletic_profile: Generational athlete playing both sides of ball
talent_profile.separator_ability: Elite route running and contested catch ability
talent_profile.ceiling_projection: Alpha WR1 potential from rookie year

situation_analysis.offensive_context: Post-Brian Thomas Jr. trade to Chicago
situation_analysis.offensive_system: Should feature Hunter immediately as primary weapon

alpha_indicators.draft_position: Top 3 pick - franchise believes he's generational
alpha_indicators.college_production: Dominated at highest level of competition
alpha_indicators.market_recognition: Fell to Joseph at 1.02 in rookie draft

detailed_alpha_case.joseph_philosophy: Football is super athletes chasing a ball - lions let loose on prowl. Best player needs ball in his hands as much as possible
detailed_alpha_case.unicorn_status: Unicorn player - never had anyone like him before
detailed_alpha_case.reception_perception_validation: Matt Harmon claims Travis breaks the scale at WR - reception perception is gospel in ball knower WR realm
detailed_alpha_case.two_way_dominance: Almost 1300 yards and 15 touchdowns in final season WHILE PLAYING CORNERBACK
detailed_alpha_case.coverage_destruction: Obliterates zone and man coverage - unguardable
detailed_alpha_case.coaching_upgrade: Gets Liam Coen offense - was very kind to Mike Evans and Chris Godwin in Tampa
detailed_alpha_case.draft_capital_context: Jaguars traded up to get him, #2 overall draft cap as WR, first since Calvin Johnson
detailed_alpha_case.instincts: His instincts are out of this world
detailed_alpha_case.additional_factors: Joseph genuinely leaving out some things - there's more

consensus_concerns: BTJ is #1 option (jags have 240 vacated targets so who cares)
market_concerns_vs_reality.joseph_assessment: All valid concerns, we have never had a player like him before
market_concerns_vs_reality.conviction_stance: I'll go with my gut here
market_concerns_vs_reality.target_context: 240 vacated targets - plenty of opportunity for multiple receivers

deeper_motivation.not_about_money: Not about the $400 from league mates
deeper_motivation.not_about_bragging: Not about the 'I told you so' moments
deeper_motivation.core_satisfaction: Trusting my intuition paid off - I believe in myself
deeper_motivation.joseph_philosophy: Sometimes it's worth it just to try
deeper_motivation.personal_validation: The satisfaction comes from self-belief being rewarded
deeper_motivation.conviction_reward: When your gut feeling succeeds, it validates your analytical instincts

conviction_factors.talent_grade: Generational - once in a decade type athlete
conviction_factors.situation_grade: Excellent - clear path to targets and usage
